title: Tekkit摸组生存-part23-Computercraft教程5-loops循环结构
author: communicationDC
txt_content:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XODI2NDI4ODA4/v.swf

ComputerCraft模组编程教程
以下是turtlego的源代码：
local block=0
print("How many block forward:")
block = read()
for i=1,block go
  while not turtle.forward() do
    turtle.dig()
  end
end

做好笔记哦!
